txt_en: Winning medals wasn't the point of the Olympics. It's the participating that counts.
txt_cn: 奥运会的意义不是赢得奖牌，而是参与其中。
author: Pierre de Coubertin

txt_en: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose — it teaches you about life.
txt_cn: 体育塑造你的性格，教会你遵守规则，让你体会输赢——它教会你生活。
author: Billie Jean King

txt_en: I didn't set out to beat the world; I just set out to do my absolute best.
txt_cn: 我并没有打算打败世界，我只是全力以赴。
author: Shaun White

txt_en: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
txt_cn: 我的人生经历了一次又一次的失败，正因为如此，我才能成功。
author: Michael Jordan

txt_en: Faster, Higher, Stronger – Together
txt_cn: 更快、更高、更强——更团结
author: Olympic Motto

txt_en: Winning medals wasn't the point of the Olympics. It's the participating that counts.
txt_cn: 奥运会的意义不是赢得奖牌，而是参与其中。
author: Pierre de Coubertin

txt_en: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose — it teaches you about life.
txt_cn: 体育塑造你的性格，教会你遵守规则，让你体会输赢——它教会你生活。
author: Billie Jean King

txt_en: I didn't set out to beat the world; I just set out to do my absolute best.
txt_cn: 我并没有打算打败世界，我只是全力以赴。
author: Shaun White

txt_en: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
txt_cn: 我的人生经历了一次又一次的失败，正因为如此，我才能成功。
author: Michael Jordan

txt_en: Faster, Higher, Stronger – Together
txt_cn: 更快、更高、更强——更团结
author: Olympic Motto

txt_en: Winning medals wasn't the point of the Olympics. It's the participating that counts.
txt_cn: 奥运会的意义不是赢得奖牌，而是参与其中。
author: Pierre de Coubertin

txt_en: You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.
txt_cn: 既然无法逃避自己的心，不如就好好地听听它在说些什么。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want, you're gonna make it happen.
txt_cn: 如果你足够自信，也知道自己想要什么，就一定会实现心中所想。
author: Mariah Carey, "Make It Happen"

txt_en: May your past be the sound of your feet upon the ground. Carry on.
txt_cn: 愿你的过去只是你前进步伐所踏出的声响，继续前行吧。
author: Fun., "Carry On"

txt_en: When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be.
txt_cn: 只要有你相伴，便无他处可比拟。
author: Clean Bandit, "Rather Be"

txt_en: It's been my experience that you can nearly always enjoy something if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
txt_cn: 我的经验是，事情只要下定决心去享受，就基本都能享受。
author: 《小小安妮》

txt_en: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
txt_cn: 我跨越了时间的瀚海来把你寻找。
author: 《惊情四百年》

txt_en: Life is a collection of moments. The idea is to have as many good ones as you can.
txt_cn: 生命由一个个瞬间组成，宗旨就是尽可能多地拥抱美好瞬间。
author: 《爱情限时恋未尽》

txt_en: In any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety.
txt_cn: 任何时刻我们都有两个选择：往前走向成长，或退后走向安全。
author: Abraham Maslow

txt_en: Only one thing can make a soul complete, and that thing is love.
txt_cn: 只有一样东西可以让灵魂完整，那就是爱。
author: 《朗读者》

txt_en: Catch the moments of your life. Catch them while you're young and quick.
txt_cn: 趁你还年轻利落，把握住生命中的每一个瞬间吧。
author: 《我们这一天》

txt_en: We live in the world when we love it.
txt_cn: 我们只有热爱这个世界，才算真正地活着。
author: 泰戈尔

txt_en: You don't have to bend until you break. You just have to get up.
txt_cn: 你不必一味屈服，让自己受伤，你只需打起精神做自己。
author: Colbie Caillat, "Try"

txt_en: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
txt_cn: 人生匆匆，如果不时常停下脚步四处瞧瞧，你可能就会错过它。
author: 《春天不是读书天》

txt_en: Remember there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
txt_cn: 记住没有小善之举这回事，每一次善行都会激起无穷尽的连锁反应。
author: Scott Adams

txt_en: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
txt_cn: 人依靠行动而活，而非想法。
author: Anatole France
